revised_title: Kenneth Bailey: A Pioneering Protein Chemist
tldr: Kenneth Bailey was a devoted protein chemist who, alongside his friend and collaborator W.T. Astbury, made significant contributions to the field of protein chemistry. Bailey's work focused on understanding protein denaturation, enzyme kinetics, and the structure of muscle proteins. His research on artificial wool and the study of intermediary protein degradation products were groundbreaking and helped shape the future of protein chemistry.
